[[inst_hl_lbup]]
==== HL.LBUP

*Syntax:* hl.lbup [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lbup.svg[HL.LBUP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/PAIR
